intro.title: Break the mold.
intro.paragraph1: DailyNotes was born different. It's the watch industry's first notebook-style editor to deliver rich, text-like creation. The powerful journal editor is easy for anyone to master, and it comes with a vast library of personalization resources that are <highlight>completely free to use</highlight>.
intro.paragraph2: Inside your journal you can import <highlight>photos, videos, and voice recordings</highlight>, add <highlight>stickers you love</highlight>, and DailyNotes is the first smartwatch journaling app to feature <highlight>global content search</highlight> and <highlight>calendar search</highlight>.

network.heading: Meet our new friend!
network.paragraph1: Become a <highlight>DailyNotes CE user</highlight> to unlock the <highlight>latest and greatest features of Dailys Network</highlight>.
network.paragraph2: Grab the newest DailyNotes CE from the <link/> page and be among the first to experience the <highlight>completely different journey</highlight> Dailys Network delivers.
network.paragraph3: <highlight>A vibrant collection of customization resources</highlight> awaits you in Dailys Network—it has <highlight>everything you can imagine</highlight> to refresh your journal with personality and energy.

items.text: User reviews are now being actively recruited! Come and team up with me! (?)

DailyNotes has completely transformed the way I record my daily school life. I never expected such rich features on a smartwatch. Easy to use, powerful, and completely free—this is exactly the smartwatch app I've been looking for!
highlights: Easy to use, powerful, and completely free

items.text: A great smartwatch app. Lightweight, feature-complete, with a clean and straightforward interface, no unnecessary bloat. It has all the features you'd want. Highly recommended.

downloadHero.title: Try the latest DailyNotes
downloadHero.subtitle: This is the moment!
downloadHero.body1: I forgot the beginning, the middle, and the ending.
downloadHero.body2: Anyway, please keep supporting the DailyNotes family—thanks, nya~
